course_title: Sem: Personality & Social Psych: Psych of Self-Care & Wellness
class_notes: What is self-care, how do we develop it and how does it contribute to wellness?  Objectives of this course include 1) learning developmental theories and research central to the field of positive psychology 2) Discussion of selected readings on self-care and wellness including relationships with others and oneself, work, and academic performance, and 3) learning evidence-based intervention methods to improve overall wellbeing that students can also apply to their own lives.
course_description: Selected issues in personality theory and research.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 250 (36 Eagle Ro
